issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
TIMOB-7004 states there there is a bug in Android where relative images are not loading correctly, however it's the opposite. The images are loading in Windows (and iOS) when they should not be.

In TIMOB-7004 test case, {{app.js}} will {{require('ui/homeView.js')}} which creates an ImageView with a relative path. On Android, an image path of {{commonimages/home-home.png}} will try to load {{ui/commonimages/home-home.png}}. On Windows (and iOS), it appears to treat relative image paths as absolute paths, which is not correct.
fields.summary: Windows: Relative images paths are not relative to Resources dir, not current JS file
